title: Add a button to block player (bots) that spams invite
body:
So here's the thing and I am pretty sure I'm not the only one, I keep getting invite demands from Bots generating links to sites offering LoL services, the problem is, when I receive one of this I can either

- Accept the invite (which I obviously don't want to)
- Refuse the invite (then receive it again later)
- Accept the invite, go to settings, turn on option to see offline friend, scroll trough all the list, block that account and then go back to the options once again to turn off offline friends (which forces me to accept the bot demand before having to go trough all the process for removing it)

Unless I don't know about some faster way to do it, I propose that a third choice be added when one receives a friend request to block that person right away, it would make dealing with these bots a lot smoother.

Yeah I know my english sucks = (

replies.body:
Yes you can type a name into the block list

But the problem with these bots is that they will keep making new accounts as they get blocked and the issue would continue. Riot needs some sort of spam detection system to detect and ban these accounts as soon as possible.
You can just block them by typing their name directly into the Block List.

i suffer from the same thing.  you can block the individual names... but they keep generating new accounts.  but once you decline the invite you never see that exact name again.

if you want to get the invites like OP is talking about play a bunch of 3v3 bot games solo till you hit that time when all the bots are bot'ing
then you too will have your name on the list.

you will know its them because all they do is run to enemy nexus for 20 mins then afk
